page.title: 23Changes in Mansfield Woodhouse: Technology
page.content: Mobile phone technology dominates communications, with most of this area having good reception from mobile phone masts of which there are many. Fibre optic cable or satellite dishes provide TV, broadband internet and phone service to many homes in this area. Social networking by text or Facebook and Twitter are widely used by all age groups. Shopping and all manner of retail items are often ordered via the internet and delivered speedily to homes. Digital TV has recently replaced analogue signal and High Definition picture is now widely available.
